ticket.title: Schema registry + bounded deserialization enforcement for all new FAC schemas (job/lease/profile/receipts/manifests)

in_scope: Ensure every new schema in this RFC is implemented with:
Add a central registry list (or tests) preventing accidental schema id drift.
out_of_scope: General schema evolution framework beyond FAC.

steps: Add schema structs and unit tests verifying schema ids.
Add bounded parsing wrappers reused across code.

criteria: No schema is parsed without size bounds and deny_unknown_fields in default mode.
